column.name: type
column.description: There are different types of attributes.. classname

column.name: uniq
column.description: Do the values for this attribute need to be unique across all assets (and derivatives)?

column.name: url
column.description: The URL that is remapping to another URL

column.name: remap_url
column.description: The (hopefully) valid URL that is being remapped to

column.name: expires
column.description: The time when this remap expires. Should be cleaned up after this time.

column.name: never_delete
column.description: If this option is locked (true) then the remap wont be deleted at all. To delete the remap we need to first unlock this option

column.name: auto_remap
column.description: 1 = automatic, 0 = manual, null = unknown (for upgrades)

column.name: type_code
column.description: The type code of the asset type which we are restricting access to. Set to NULL to allow access to all asset types.

column.name: screen
column.description: The screen we are restricting access to. Set to NULL to allow access to all screens.

column.name: section
column.description: The section of the screen we are restricting access to. Set to NULL to allow access to all sections.

column.name: type
column.description: The type of the message as a path eg. asset.workflow OR asset.permissions

column.name: parameters
column.description: Any params needed for search or jut making sense of the message in the form "key:value;key:value" eg. assetid:4;attributeid:12

column.name: assetid
column.description: The asset (if applicable) the log message is about. If it's not about an asset, this is left as null.

column.name: code_name
column.description: A unique ID that a HIPO object can use to determine if another HIPO is running

column.name: running
column.description: Flag to indicate if the HIPO Job has started running yet

column.name: userid
column.description: ID of the user that this job is being run by

column.name: source_code_name
column.description: The code_name of hipo job that started a chain of jobs running

column.name: source_lockid
column.description: The Lock ID for the parent of this chain of locks

column.name: expires
column.description: NULL indicates no expiry time

column.name: id
column.description: Trigger ID

column.name: name
column.description: Trigger Name

column.name: data
column.description: Serialized trigger data

column.name: description
column.description: Trigger description

column.name: active
column.description: A flag denoting whether a trigger is active or not

column.name: category
column.description: Trigger category

column.name: event
column.description: Event type code (asset type) a trigger in triggerid is interested in.

column.name: assetid
column.description: Asset ID of the asset broadcasting the event a trigger in triggerid is interested in.

column.name: asset_type
column.description: Asset Type of the asset broadcasting the event

column.name: treeid
column.description: Tree ID. If broadcaster is a child of it (immediate or not) the trigger might want to be executed.

column.name: tree_propagate
column.description: A flag marking whether trigger is interested in immediate or all children of the tree ID (in treeid).

column.name: triggerid
column.description: Trigger ID every hash line corresponds to

column.name: parentid
column.description: If the broadcasting asset has a parent with id in this column, trigger might want to be executed

column.name: parent_type
column.description: The type of parent asset (purpose is similar to parentid)

column.name: childid
column.description: If the broadcasting asset has a child with id in this column, trigger might want to be executed

column.name: child_type
column.description: The type of child asset (purpose is similar to childid)

column.name: path
column.description: The directory suffix from the repository root that this file is situated in

column.name: removal
column.description: Was this version a removed version ?

column.name: termid
column.description: Term ID

column.name: term
column.description: Term

column.name: thesid
column.description: Thesaurus Asset ID

column.name: termid
column.description: Term ID

column.name: name
column.description: Note Name

column.name: value
column.description: Note Value

column.name: thesid
column.description: Thesaurus ID

column.name: relid
column.description: Term ID

column.name: relation
column.description: Relation

column.name: thesid
column.description: Thesaurus Asset ID

column.name: linkid
column.description: ID of link between two terms

column.name: major
column.description: Parent Term

column.name: minor
column.description: Term

column.name: relid
column.description: Term

column.name: thesid
column.description: Thesaurus Asset ID

column.name: cache_key
column.description: The cache key of this entry

column.name: perm_key
column.description: The permission key of this entry

column.name: url
column.description: The URL of this cache entry

column.name: assetid
column.description: The assetid of the cached asset

column.name: expires
column.description: The time when this cache entry expires

column.name: path
column.description: The file path to the cached content
